building civil_order            ;;;Roman Barracks
{
    levels order order1 order2 order3 field_mars imperial_legion praetorian_training castra_praetoria
    {
        order requires factions { romans_brutii, }
        {
            capability
            {   
                happiness_bonus bonus -2 requires building_present_min_level merc_building merc_building
                law_bonus bonus 2 requires factions { romans_brutii, }
                population_growth_bonus bonus 4 requires factions { romans_brutii, }  and not building_present_min_level core_building proconsuls_palace
        ;taxable_income_bonus bonus -40
        ;trade_base_income_bonus bonus -10
        ;mine_resource bonus -2
        ; taxable_income_bonus bonus 10 requires resource iron
        ;taxable_income_bonus bonus 5 requires resource lead
        ;taxable_income_bonus bonus 5 requires resource copper
        ;taxable_income_bonus bonus 5 requires resource tin
        ;taxable_income_bonus bonus 15 requires building_present_min_level smith blacksmith          
                     trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires building_present_min_level smith foundry
         trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires building_present_min_level smith grain_export
         taxable_income_bonus bonus 1 requires building_present_min_level smith foundry
         taxable_income_bonus bonus 1 requires building_present_min_level smith grain_export
            }
             faction_capability
            {
  trade_base_income_bonus bonus -4
        mine_resource bonus -1
 	trade_base_income_bonus bonus 3 requires resource wild_animals
 	trade_base_income_bonus bonus 3 requires resource timber
        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2 requires resource iron
        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires resource lead
        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires resource copper
        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires resource tin
	trade_base_income_bonus bonus 3 requires resource grain
        taxable_income_bonus bonus -5
 	taxable_income_bonus bonus 3 requires resource wild_animals
 	taxable_income_bonus bonus 3 requires resource timber
        taxable_income_bonus bonus 2 requires resource iron
        taxable_income_bonus bonus 1 requires resource lead
        taxable_income_bonus bonus 1 requires resource copper
        taxable_income_bonus bonus 1 requires resource tin
	taxable_income_bonus bonus 3 requires resource grain
            }
construction  8 
            cost  10000
            settlement_min village

                happiness_bonus bonus 2 requires factions { romans_scipii, }  and hidden_resource area7

        ;trade_base_income_bonus bonus -10
        ;mine_resource bonus -2
        ;taxable_income_bonus bonus 10 requires resource iron
        ;taxable_income_bonus bonus 5 requires resource lead

    levels stables cavalry_barracks hippodrome circus_maximus

        stables requires factions { parthia, } or factions { romans_brutii, }  and hidden_resource rome

            capability

                happiness_bonus bonus -2 requires building_present_min_level merc_building merc_building

        ;taxable_income_bonus bonus -40
        ;trade_base_income_bonus bonus -10
        ;mine_resource bonus -2
        ;taxable_income_bonus bonus 10 requires resource iron
        ;taxable_income_bonus bonus 5 requires resource lead
        ;taxable_income_bonus bonus 5 requires resource copper
        ;taxable_income_bonus bonus 5 requires resource tin
        ;taxable_income_bonus bonus 15 requires building_present_min_level smith blacksmith          
                                 trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires building_present_min_level smith foundry
         trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires building_present_min_level smith grain_export
         taxable_income_bonus bonus 1 requires building_present_min_level smith foundry
         taxable_income_bonus bonus 1 requires building_present_min_level smith grain_export
            }
             faction_capability
            {
  trade_base_income_bonus bonus -4

building road
{
    levels roads paved_roads highways
    {
        roads requires factions { barbarian, nomad, carthage, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, }
        {
            capability
            {
                road_level 0
                taxable_income_bonus bonus -5
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 10 requires resource dogs
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires resource dogs
        ;taxable_income_bonus bonus -50
        ;trade_base_income_bonus bonus 6
        ;taxable_income_bonus bonus 20 requires resource marble
        ;taxable_income_bonus bonus -30 requires hidden_resource river_port
        ;taxable_income_bonus bonus 20 requires resource pigs
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1 requires building_present_min_level hinterland_trade_routes trade_route
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 3 requires building_present_min_level hinterland_trade_routes incense_road
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 7 requires building_present_min_level hinterland_trade_routes silk_road
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 4 requires building_present_min_level hinterland_trade_routes amber_road
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 5 requires building_present_min_level hinterland_trade_routes via_maris
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2 requires building_present_min_level hinterland_trade_routes tin_road
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 6 requires building_present_min_level hinterland_trade_routes royal_road
            }
            faction_capability
            {
        taxable_income_bonus bonus -5
        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1
        taxable_income_bonus bonus 2 requires resource marble
        taxable_income_bonus bonus -3 requires hidden_resource river_port
        taxable_income_bonus bonus 2 requires resource pigs
        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 4 requires resource silk
        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 3 requires resource amber
        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2 requires resource incense
            } 
            construction  2 
             cost 2500
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
                paved_roads
            }
        }
        paved_roads requires factions { romans_julii, boii, gauls, dacia, germans, spain, carthage, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, }
        {
            capability
            {
                road_level 1 requires factions { carthage, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, }
                road_level 0 requires factions { barbarian, }
                taxable_income_bonus bonus -10
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 20 requires resource dogs
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2 requires resource dogs
        ;taxable_income_bonus bonus -200
        ;        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 12
        ;taxable_income_bonus bonus 80 requires resource marble

    levels tavern bardic_circle

        }

               taxable_income_bonus bonus 5 requires resource marble
            }

            settlement_min town

;;the following buildings are an EXTENSION of the mining tree, not meant to stand alone.
building advanced_minerals
{
    levels deep_vein precious_metals weapons_metals land_exploitation land_exploitation2
    {
        deep_vein requires factions { barbarian, nomad, carthaginian, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, }  and building_present_min_level mines mines+1
        {
            capability
            {
                mine_resource 40 requires resource gold and not building_present_min_level merc_building merc_building
                mine_resource 30 requires resource silver and not building_present_min_level merc_building merc_building
                mine_resource bonus 10 requires building_present_min_level merc_building merc_building
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 350 requires resource copper
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 350 requires resource tin 
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 250 requires resource iron
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 250 requires resource lead
                population_health_bonus bonus -1
            }
            faction_capability
            {
        taxable_income_bonus bonus -50
        taxable_income_bonus bonus 25 requires hidden_resource river_port
        taxable_income_bonus bonus 20 requires resource pigs
        trade_base_income_bonus bonus -5
        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2 requires hidden_resource river_port
        trade_base_income_bonus bonus 2 requires resource pigs
            }
            construction  4 
            cost 20000
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                precious_metals   ;;Deep Tunnel Mining
                weapons_metals   ;;Hyraulic Metal Mining
            }
        }

        {
            capability
            {

               ; trade_base_income_bonus bonus -5
               ;taxable_income_bonus bonus 5 requires resource marble

building hinterland_festival_romans_brutii
{
     levels roman_festival_romans_brutii
     {

building hospitals
{
    levels first_aid_center street_clinic hospital surgery_center
    {
        first_aid_center requires factions { nomad, barbarian, carthage, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, }
        {
            capability
            {
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
                ;taxable_income_bonus bonus -15
population_health_bonus bonus 1
            }
             faction_capability
            {
                taxable_income_bonus bonus -2
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus -2
            }
            construction 1
           cost 2500
            settlement_min large_town
            upgrades
            {
                street_clinic
            }
        }
        street_clinic requires factions { barbarian, carthage, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level health sewers
        {
            capability
            {
                population_health_bonus bonus 2
                happiness_bonus bonus 1
                ;taxable_income_bonus bonus -30
            }
             faction_capability
            {
                taxable_income_bonus bonus -4
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus -4
            }
            construction 2
            cost 5000
            settlement_min city
            upgrades
            {
                 hospital
            }
        }
        hospital requires factions { barbarian, carthage, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level health baths
        {
            capability
            {
                population_health_bonus bonus 3
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                ;taxable_income_bonus bonus -45
            }
             faction_capability
            {
                taxable_income_bonus bonus -8
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus -8
            }
            construction 3
            cost 20000
            settlement_min large_city
            upgrades
            {
                 surgery_center
            }
        }
        surgery_center requires factions { barbarian, carthage, eastern, parthia, egyptian, greek, roman, } and building_present_min_level health aqueduct
        {
            capability
            {
                population_health_bonus bonus 4
                happiness_bonus bonus 2
                ;taxable_income_bonus bonus -60
            }
             faction_capability
            {
                taxable_income_bonus bonus -12
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus -12
            }
            construction 4
            cost 40000
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins
    {
    }
}
building legion_suppy ; festival
{
    levels legion_suppy
    {
        legion_suppy requires building_present_min_level theatres theatre and building_present_min_level academic ludus_magnus  
        {
            capability
            {
                ;taxable_income_bonus bonus -10 requires not building_present_min_level agriculture farms+2
                ;taxable_income_bonus bonus -10 requires not building_present_min_level products fish1
                ;taxable_income_bonus bonus -10
                ;taxable_income_bonus bonus 2 requires resource wine
                ;taxable_income_bonus bonus 2 requires building_present_min_level grain grain_facility and not resource grain
                ;taxable_income_bonus bonus 2 requires resource grain
                ;taxable_income_bonus bonus 2 requires resource wild_animals
                ;taxable_income_bonus bonus 2 requires resource olive_oil
                ;taxable_income_bonus bonus 2 requires hidden_resource river_port
                ;taxable_income_bonus bonus 2 requires hidden_resource naval
  happiness_bonus bonus 4
  trade_base_income_bonus bonus 20
            }
              faction_capability
            {
             happiness_bonus bonus 4
  trade_base_income_bonus bonus -10
taxable_income_bonus bonus -50
            }
            construction  1 
            cost  40000 
            settlement_min huge_city
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}

;;;This building is specific to Celtic factions and dacia
building hallstatt
{
    levels hallstatt 
    {
        hallstatt requires factions { gauls, romans_julii, boii, dacia, }  and hidden_resource area5 or hidden_resource area13 and resource furs
        {
            capability
            {
                taxable_income_bonus bonus 20
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 1
            }
             faction_capability
            {
        taxable_income_bonus bonus -50
        taxable_income_bonus bonus 25 requires hidden_resource river_port
        taxable_income_bonus bonus 20 requires resource pigs
                trade_base_income_bonus bonus 16
            }
            construction  4 
            cost 10000
            settlement_min town
            upgrades
            {
            }
        }
    }
    plugins 
    {
    }
}
